item.title: I Wish Snow White Had Been More Like One Of The Wildest (And Most Underrated) Live-Action Disney Remakes
item.description: Snow White could've been a much better movie if it had tried to be more unique, as opposed to playing it completely straight like the movie did.

item.title: Star Wars Celebrates 20 Years Of Animation With Anniversary Video Featuring Lucas Footage, Dave Filoni, & More
item.description: Following a big Star Wars Celebration panel in Japan, a new video celebrating the 20th anniversary of Star Wars animation has been released.

item.title: Star Wars Celebration 2025 Live Blog: Day 1 - The Mandalorian & Grogu And Lucasfilm Animation Panel Updates
item.description: Star Wars Celebration 2025 is here, and we're bringing you updates from day 1 - including The Mandalorian & Grogu and animation - live from Japan.
